inputs.selection_motivation: US Treasury yields are a primary driver of the USD exchange rate via carry trade flows and risk sentiment.
inputs.candidate_motivation: US 10â€‘Year Treasury yields are driven by monetary policy, inflation expectations, and the relative strength of the dollar, while they also move in tandem with equity indices and other bond markets. Therefore, Fed Policy, US Inflation, TIPS auctions, the dollar and euro benchmarks, Euribor, and major equity indices are the most plausible influencers or peers.
